description:
Ready to fight hard to help you get the justice you deserve, the attorneys at the Lanier Law Group P.A. in Greensboro, North Carolina, are prepared to do all they can to increase the likelihood you will receive the maximum amount of compensation possible for the injuries and losses you suffered as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

With a history that dates back to 1997, our law firm has served the residents of North Carolina for more than 23 years. During this time, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients dealing with catastrophic personal injury and wrongful death claims as well as workers' compensation and Social Security Disability claims.

As further evidence of our success, our law firm has grown to include 11 total offices in North Carolina, and our attorneys have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers, including recognitions as Top 100 Trial Lawyers from The National Trial Lawyers and America's Top 100 High Stakes Litigators. From our unwavering commitment to those we serve and superior client service both inside and outside of the courtroom, we have also received numerous positive testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

This means you can expect to receive the highest level of representation directly from a local attorney who has your best interests at heart and will fight tirelessly on your behalf until the end. To begin the process, you can contact the Lanier Law Group P.A. to schedule a free case evaluation, and our law firm also offers virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe.
